extendedInfo.description: 'Chinese History Timeline(Free)' is an application which shows the list of important events from Chinese history. Each event includes a hot-link to the appropriate entry of Wikipedia. This will help users get more information about the event. The application also features the maps of important times, list of important people, and comparison table of Chinese history and Asia history. You can enjoy Chinese history easily on the go with Chinese History timeline. Features 1. Chinese history timeline 2. Hot-links to the entries of Wikipedia 3. Maps of important times 4. List of people 5. Comparison table of Chinese history and Asia history * Notice 1. 3G or WiFi access is required in order to access Wikipedia. 2. The explanations in Wikipedia may be different from the developer's opinion.DevÂ·Sales: DaolSoft, Co., Ltd.ê°ë°Â·íë§¤: (ì£¼)ë¤ì¬ìíí¸

reviews.title: Very interesting add-on to formal course
reviews.comment: Can be improved by accepting swiping instead of clicking on buttons to scroll sideways in maps. Also who is who lacks a search feature. I could not find Cixi. Very useful already, but can improve
reviews.author: Stanley Debono
